name: Jump With Me
description:
Jump with me is a jumping game which features collecting coins by jumping on trampolines.
Tap left/right to land your character on the trampoline.
Avoid ravens left to right and collect coins in mid-air.
Jump higher to collect more coins.
If you are good at jumping game, Try this. Jump with me!
Unlock more characters with coins.

Features
-Try to land as close to the center of the trampoline to soar higher.
-You will be warned prior to any incoming ravens. Prepare for impact.
-Magnet pulls coins automatically.
-Shields to protect from any collisions.
-Variety of characters are available. Get a capsule for 3,000 coins.
-EPIC rarity characters have special in-game abilities.
